name: Falling Blocks (itch) (LazyMammal)
description:
Game Jam Spirit: Day 1

This is the first in my "Game Jam Spirit" series. I'm going to remake classic arcade-style games in Unity.

These games won't always be pretty. The goal is to create rapid prototypes of many different games.

Web Version: lazymammal.com/blocks

Github: LazyMammal/FallingBlocks
